name: Run Higher
storyline:
Run Higher

Run Higher is an exciting game with multiple unlockable levels where your goal is to run to the top in each level. Your best time is recorded, so you can constantly challenge yourself to improve.

But beware! This is not just a simple running game—objects are constantly falling from above, rolling towards you, and you must skillfully dodge them. If you get hit too many times, you will have to start over. Your survival depends on your health bar, which shows how many hits you can take.

Fortunately, there are two different power-ups that can help you:
1. Health Refill Restores your health bar so you can last longer.
2. Power Shield Gives you a shield for a few seconds that deflects all falling objects.

When you successfully complete a race, you earn XP (experience points), which you need to unlock new levels. Alternatively, you can trade your XP for fun hats that you can wear in each race to customize your character.

Currently, there are 10 different levels and a total of 10 different hats. Future updates are planned to include more features, as well as new levels and hats to make the game even more exciting.

Get ready for an exciting adventure full of obstacles and challenges in Run Higher!
summary: Run Higher is an exciting running game where you run through levels, dodging falling objects and saving your best time. Use power-ups like life replenishment and power shield. Collect XP to unlock new levels and fun headgear.
